```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AVmfWL43B70&list=PLJfshcspBCYeJeO8YFT5e5HxuYOb5a_1W&index=8&t=7s
library(flexdashboard)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)

df <- penguins

df %>% count(species)
```

Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
```{r}
selectInput("v_species", label = "Species", choices = c("All", "Adelie", "Chinstrap", "Gentoo"), selected = "All")
```

Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
renderPlot({
  df %>% 
    select(-island, -sex) %>% 
    pivot_longer(-species) %>% 
    group_by(name) %>% 
    mutate(value = scale(value)) %>% 
    ungroup() %>% 
    filter(str_detect(species, if_else(input$v_species == "All", "", input$v_species))) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = value, y = name, fill = species)) + 
    geom_density_ridges(alpha = .7) + 
    theme(legend.position = "top") + 
    labs(y = "", x = "")
})
```

Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
df %>% 
  select(-island, -sex) %>% 
  pivot_longer(-species) %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  mutate(value = scale(value)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = name, y = value, color = species)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + 
  theme(legend.position = "top") + 
  labs(x = "", y = "")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
df %>% 
  count(species, island) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  mutate(n = n / sum(n)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = n, fill = island)) + 
  geom_col() + 
  theme(legend.position = "top") + 
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_percent()) + 
  labs(y = "", x = "")
```
